text: Alla Yakovlevna Ioshpe (Yoshpe) (; 13 June 1937 - 30 January 2021)Умерла Алла Иошпе was a Soviet-Russian pop singer. She was honored with a People's Artist of the Russian Federation in 2002.Почётное звание присвоено указом президента № 116 от 31 января 2002 года She was born in Moscow. In 1960, at a university event, she met Stakhan Rakhimov. They formed a pop duo. Yoshpe died on 30 January 2021 in Moscow, aged 83. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Soviet singers Category:Russian pop singers Category:Singers from Moscow
title: Alla Yoshpe
